column1: Prompt: You are generating questions for an educational app aimed toward educating 8 year olds.  Generate simple perimeter questions similar to "Find the perimeter of a rectangle with a length 3 and width 4". Make sure all numbers are whole
Find the perimeter of a square with a side length of 5.
Find the perimeter of a rectangle with a length of 7 and a width of 2.
Find the perimeter of a square with a side length of 8.
Find the perimeter of a rectangle with a length of 6 and a width of 9.
Find the perimeter of a square with a side length of 10.
Find the perimeter of a rectangle with a length of 5 and a width of 12.
Find the perimeter of a square with a side length of 6.
Find the perimeter of a rectangle with a length of 8 and a width of 3.
Find the perimeter of a square with a side length of 9.
Find the perimeter of a rectangle with a length of 4 and a width of 11.
